definition: to concentrate (a liquid)/concentration/espresso coffee/abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

pinyin: Yi4 shi4 nong2 suo1 ka1 fei1

definition: a device for concentrating (a liquid)/a condenser

sentences.english: First, bleach should be referred to as full-strength household bleach.
sentences.chinese: 首先，应该浓缩的家用漂白粉。

sentences.english: Its gas is centrally concentrated, but it does not have a central bulge of stars.
sentences.chinese: 它的气体浓缩在中心，但中心又没有核球。

sentences.english: Recently restaurants sell soups and drinks made from concentrate has brought into focus.
sentences.chinese: 近来，全城热议餐厅使用浓缩液制作汤及饮料。

sentences.english: So we're confident that the North Koreans do, in fact, have a program to enrich uranium to produce nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们确知北韩有制造核武器的浓缩铀项目。

sentences.english: The author telescoped 100 years of history into a book.
sentences.chinese: 作者把100年的历史浓缩在一本书中。

sentences.english: It is a national one-level theme restaurant with Sanxia culture.
sentences.chinese: 是一家浓缩三峡文化的国家一级主题餐厅。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the quality control method for Dangshen Lizhong concentrated pills.
sentences.chinese: 目的完善党参理中浓缩丸的质量控制方法。

sentences.english: Meat-textured fish protein concentrate (MT-FPC) is a new product developed in 1980's.
sentences.chinese: 畜肉状浓缩鱼蛋白是八十年代开发的一种新产品。

sentences.english: A double latte has 2 shots of espresso with either hot or cold milk.
sentences.chinese: 双份拿铁有两份浓缩咖啡加热或冰牛奶。

sentences.english: The script should be condensed as much as possible.
sentences.chinese: 这个脚本应该尽可能进行浓缩。

sentences.english: Elixirs are concentrated alcohol extractions that are similar to both teas and tinctures .
sentences.chinese: 长生不老药是浓缩的酒精萃取物，类似于茶和酊剂。

sentences.english: PCR products of these clones were concentrated and spotted on membrane array.
sentences.chinese: 这些克隆的PCR产物经过浓缩后点制到尼龙膜上。

sentences.english: The concentration characteristics of nanofiltration membrane for treating Gentamicin B solution were presented.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了纳滤膜对庆大霉素B溶液的浓缩性能。

sentences.english: The apoptosis of L. b probably exist during super-concentrated incubation.
sentences.chinese: 在超浓缩培养过程中可能存在细胞凋亡。

sentences.english: It is thus dilutional acidosis and contraction alkalosis with a fresh insight!
sentences.chinese: 这正是稀释性酸中毒和浓缩性碱中毒的新观点。

sentences.english: You can't distill it at that point here.

definition: best feature/most important part of an object/quintessence/essence/soul
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to settle/to precipitate (solid sediment out of a solution)
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
to be full of (emotion)/to brim with (love, tears etc)
to permeate/to percolate/fig. to saturate (with emotion)
to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
